title: Uncontrollable Mech

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You will visit a random player each night, and you will be informed about who you're targeting. Each night, you may choose to either deal them a Powerful attack, protect them with Powerful defense, or roleblock them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You have Basic defense for the first time you're attacked. When this is activated, you will be able to choose your targets at night instead of targeting them randomly.

desc:
Post 306
*I promise, it's functional, it's just, er... a little unreliable.*
